com.ibm.jikes.skij
Class SchemeException

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.lang.Throwable
        |
        +--java.lang.Exception
              |
              +--com.ibm.jikes.skij.SchemeException
Direct Known Subclasses:
ContinuationException
public class SchemeException
extends Exception

All exceptions in Skij. A SchemeException is created with a message string or another exception to be encapsulated, or both. SchemeExceptions can accumulate a backtrace (built up as they throw out of nested invocations of eval) which the user can display for debugging.

See Also:
